page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN SKERRIES
page.content:
My mother goes out at half past nine and visits each day two of the four houses where old folk live. She helps them because they are{old age {pensioners.}She does the{house work like making beds and washing dishes. Sometimes she fetches the messages. Without a{home help}the people might have to go to an old folk's home.
At 8.10 my mother wakes me and my sister and gives us our breakfast. At 10.45 she comes to school to work as an{auxiliary teacher.}She plays games with the{peerie ones}(youngest ones) reads stories and helps them with their work. Two nights a week she runs the{club}in the hall. The age group on Wednesdays is 5-11 and on Fridays 11 and up. You can play games and have juice and crisps.
